basket.emptyBasket: There are no items in your basket yet
basket.mobileVerify: You will receive a PIN via SMS after filling out your mobile number. The next step is to fill in this code. At the end of your order you will receive an SMS with a link to complete your order.
basket.title: Title
basket.pinSentTo: Enter the pin-code that has been sent to
basket.yourOrderPlaced: Your order is being placed with the retailer
basket.whenOrderBeenProcessed: When your order has been processed, you will receive a confirmation email from the retailer.
basket.3dSecure: Your bank may require payment verification and request your 3D-Secure passcode. In this case we'll send you an SMS shortly.
basket.returnOrderDescription: This shop required a sign up for purchasing. So we created an account for you for you order. It might be required that you login to this account if you want to return this order. If this is the case, please use the login details below.
basket.returnOrderDescriptionBottom: Returns get handled by the shop as if you bought on their site directly and their conditions apply.
basket.noFinishedOrders: You don't have any finished orders yet
basket.youHaventPurchases: You haven't made any purchases yet
basket.browseSomeScenes: Browse some scenes to find popular products
basket.weUseUB: We use UB Checkout to securely place your order at the retailers. By tapping ‘Place Orders’, you agree to the [[UB Terms]].
